title: Strictly Come Dancing: week six – live
summary: In the Halloween Spooktacular, Lewis Cope achieved the season's first perfect score of 40, while Karen Carney impressed with her Peaky Blinders performance. Four couples found themselves near the bottom of the standings. The suspense now builds as viewers await to see who will be eliminated.

title: Liverpool v Aston Villa: Premier League – live
summary: Defending champions are in urgent need of a victory as they take on the challenging Villans. The intense matchup is being reported minute-by-minute. Rob Smyth is covering the action.

title: Breeders’ Cup 2025 horse racing: day two – live
summary: Greg Wood provides updates on nine additional races, highlighting key insights and developments. Notably, the Breeders' Cup Classic is a major focus of these updates. Stay tuned for important information and analysis from the racing world.

title: Ireland v New Zealand: rugby union Test – live
summary: The minute-by-minute report details the anticipation surrounding the Irish team's potential to replicate their impressive 2016 victory at Soldier Field. Daniel Gallan provides updates on the unfolding match, highlighting key moments and developments. Fans are eager to see if Ireland can achieve another stunning performance in this high-stakes game.

title: Tottenham 0-1 Chelsea: Premier League – live reaction
summary: Chelsea secured a 1-0 victory over Tottenham, thanks to João Pedro's goal in the first half. Spurs struggled throughout the match and were fortunate not to concede additional goals. Their lackluster performance led to boos from frustrated home fans.
